summary: Defines a versatile text input control for the Flet UI framework, supporting single‑line and multiline entry, password masking, read‑only/disabled modes, icons, placeholders, cursor and selection styling, and integrates optional input filters for numeric or plain‑text content.
business_intent: Allows application developers to embed customizable, styled text entry fields in cross‑platform apps, facilitating data capture, form handling, and user interaction with validation and visual feedback.
